hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #Deku Stick Capacity#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that racing #Damp√©'s ghost# rewards...^ #a Spirit Temple Small Key# and #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #Deku Stick Capacity#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that in the #central rooms of the well# spiders hold...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #a Piece of Heart#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well GS West Inner Room
Bottom of the Well GS East Inner Room

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that ##the Market## has #3# major items.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #a Blue Rupee# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #the Water Temple# hoards #a Forest Temple Small Key#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that bombing the hole Volvagia last flew into can be rewarding.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Water Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #deep in the wasteland# is #a Strength Upgrade#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #a Blue Rupee# can be found in #the Death Mountain Crater#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that ##the Spirit Temple## has #8# major items.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's left hand# is #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Lake Hylia# is on the way of the hero.

LH (Lab).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Slingshot#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Fire Temple Small Key#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Ruto's Letter#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the path to #the Tower#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that plundering #the Forest Temple# is a foolish choice.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
